TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit GetAttachmentType extends ExchangeWebServices.BaseRequestType

Docs.summary: The class represents a request to get attached items and files on an item in an Exchange database.

remarks.para: Use the GetItem call to get the attachment identifiers to use in the GetAttachment operation.

example.para: The following code example shows a get attachment request for two attachments.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: The constructor initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <ExchangeWebServices::RequestAttachmentIdType ^> ^ AttachmentIds { cli::array <ExchangeWebServices::RequestAttachmentIdType ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <ExchangeWebServices::RequestAttachmentIdType ^> ^ value); };

Docs.summary: The property gets or sets the identifiers of the attachments to return in the response.
Docs.value: The property returns a array that identifies the attachments to return.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property ExchangeWebServices::AttachmentResponseShapeType ^ AttachmentShape { ExchangeWebServices::AttachmentResponseShapeType ^ get(); void set(ExchangeWebServices::AttachmentResponseShapeType ^ value); };

Docs.summary: The property gets or sets which additional properties to return for the attachments.
Docs.value: The property returns an that identifies which additional properties to return for attachments.
